<a id="Noise"></a>

# Noise

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [FastNoiseLite](FastNoiseLite.md)

Abstract base class for noise generators.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class defines the interface for noise generation libraries to inherit from.

A default [get_seamless_image()](Noise.md#Noise_method_get_seamless_image) implementation is provided for libraries that do not provide seamless noise. This function requests a larger image from the [get_image()](Noise.md#Noise_method_get_image) method, reverses the quadrants of the image, then uses the strips of extra width to blend over the seams.

Inheriting noise classes can optionally override this function to provide a more optimal algorithm.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="Noise_method_get_image"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Image](Image.md) **get_image**\ (\ width\: [int](int.md), height\: [int](int.md), invert\: [bool](bool.md) = false, in_3d_space\: [bool](bool.md) = false, normalize\: [bool](bool.md) = true\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Noise_method_get_image)

Returns an [Image](Image.md) containing 2D noise values.

\ **Note:** With `normalize` set to ``false``, the default implementation expects the noise generator to return values in the range ``-1.0`` to ``1.0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Noise_method_get_image_3d"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Image](Image.md)\] **get_image_3d**\ (\ width\: [int](int.md), height\: [int](int.md), depth\: [int](int.md), invert\: [bool](bool.md) = false, normalize\: [bool](bool.md) = true\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Noise_method_get_image_3d)

Returns an [Array](Array.md) of [Image](Image.md)\\ s containing 3D noise values for use with [ImageTexture3D.create()](ImageTexture3D.md#ImageTexture3D_method_create).

\ **Note:** With `normalize` set to ``false``, the default implementation expects the noise generator to return values in the range ``-1.0`` to ``1.0``.

<a id="Noise_method_get_seamless_image"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Image](Image.md) **get_seamless_image**\ (\ width\: [int](int.md), height\: [int](int.md), invert\: [bool](bool.md) = false, in_3d_space\: [bool](bool.md) = false, skirt\: [float](float.md) = 0.1, normalize\: [bool](bool.md) = true\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Noise_method_get_seamless_image)

Returns an [Image](Image.md) containing seamless 2D noise values.

\ **Note:** With `normalize` set to ``false``, the default implementation expects the noise generator to return values in the range ``-1.0`` to ``1.0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Noise_method_get_seamless_image_3d"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Image](Image.md)\] **get_seamless_image_3d**\ (\ width\: [int](int.md), height\: [int](int.md), depth\: [int](int.md), invert\: [bool](bool.md) = false, skirt\: [float](float.md) = 0.1, normalize\: [bool](bool.md) = true\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Noise_method_get_seamless_image_3d)

Returns an [Array](Array.md) of [Image](Image.md)\\ s containing seamless 3D noise values for use with [ImageTexture3D.create()](ImageTexture3D.md#ImageTexture3D_method_create).

\ **Note:** With `normalize` set to ``false``, the default implementation expects the noise generator to return values in the range ``-1.0`` to ``1.0``.
